mapper.insert: insert into orders(deliveryPlace, deliveryMemo, totalPrice, sudannum, userid, ordername, buynum) values(#{deliveryPlace}, #{deliveryMemo}, #{totalPrice}, #{sudannum}, #{userid}, #{ordername}, #{buynum})
insert into orderList(buynum, userid, goodsnum, size, quantity) values(#{buynum}, #{userid}, #{goodsnum}, #{size}, #{quantity});
